item.title: Zinda ho tum !
item.description: One of the Bollywood movies which I always loved watching has been ZNMD, here is a collection of shayari recited by Farhan Akthar (Imran) in ZNMD. A compiled version from Souncloud. Apne Hone Par Mujhko Yaqeen Aa Gaya (The poem comes after the trio’s deep-sea dive) Pighle neelam sa behta ye sama, neeli neeli si khamoshiyan, na kahin hai zameen na kahin aasmaan, sarsaraati hui tehniyaan pattiyaan,
